# General

  * **Type:** - Matrix Processing
  * **Heading:** - Rearrange
  * **Source code:** [RemoveEmptyColumns.cs](https://github.com/JurgenCox/perseus-plugins/blob/master/PerseusPluginLib/Rearrange/RemoveEmptyColumns.cs)

# Brief description

Columns containing no values or only invalid values will be removed.

Output: Same matrix but with empty columns removed.
